New Records: Fotis Ioannidis scored a brace in the match, with goals in the 23rd and 76th minutes
Key Match Events: Fotis Ioannidis scored a brace for Greece, with goals in the 23rd and 76th minutes
Matti Peltola was shown the yellow card for a bad foul in the 90+3rd minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Georgios Karaiskakis Stadium in Piraeus, Greece, with an attendance of 17,293
Others: The referee for the match was Urs Schnyder
